CustomField.description:
Surely I must know which test they attempting(lab, multiple choice) base on record type and pickllist option.
Filter Criteria ((Certification Attempt: Record TypeEQUALSMultiple Choice) AND (Certification Element: TypeEQUALSMultiple Choice)) OR ((Certification Attempt: Record TypeEQUALSLab) AND (Certification Element: TypeEQUALSLab))
CustomField.label: Certification Element
